artist: Louis Henri Sullivan Louis J.  Millet Healy and Millet
creditline: Gift of Bob Ulrich and Jill Dahlin
description: 5 complete and 2 half-circle designs with organic and geometric elements; tans, oranges, greens and cream
text: It might seem busy or distracting. But repeated on the walls and ceilings throughout the Chicago Stock Exchange, the colors and patterns of this stenciled design created harmonyâ€”even in a complex interior design loaded with colored plaster and art glass. Compare this design to the cast-iron panel above the elevator grilles in this gallery.
title: Stencil
